RelatedSentence: To decipher the latest housing data for you , our reporter Tracey Chang spoke to a few industry experts to get their take on what 's ahead for China 's property sector .
As one of the most watched economic indicators of the country , April 's housing data showed moderation in China 's housing market .
The numbers came amid chatters about a possible housing slump or even a burst of the property bubble , but real estate experts say the recent numbers are not a cause for concern .
Policymakers are already taking precaution to avoid a sudden drop in housing prices , but the effect of these measures have yet been realized .
Policymakers are already taking precaution to avoid a sudden drop in housing prices , but the effect of these measures have yet been realized .
But this time around , decision makers are taking a different approach .
Our new government is using different methods to regulate the housing market compared to the previous administration .
Our new government is using different methods to regulate the housing market compared to the previous administration .
We are not going to see massive stimulus to lift the housing market like we saw back in 2008 .
We are not going to see massive stimulus to lift the housing market like we saw back in 2008 .
Our new government wants to do reforms and implement structural changes to regulate the housing market .
Our new government wants to do reforms and implement structural changes to regulate the housing market .

Home buyers put their planned purchases on hold , as they anxiously wait for clearer policy directions .
Newest measures we can expect have a lot to do with liquidity , we are already seeing the central bank sending clear signals to ease the housing market liquidity .

China 's real estate market is indeed showing signs of cooling down , and most industry experts are expecting the government to issue more policies in the near future to stabilize the country 's property sector .
